comments:
20060919

When I did a compare for some of my changes I got the following exception. It did not appear to affect my commit.

This is caused by a concurrency problem in the old sync framework. The new model-based synchronization framwork does not have this issue and we do not plan on fixing the old one. However, I'll leave the bug open to capture the problem (i.e. I thought I had one open but couldn't find it).
